<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A class that saves hashes and textual IR snapshots of functions in a SandboxIR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/context">Context</a>, and does hash comparison when <code>expectNoDiff</code> is called.

If hashes differ, it prints textual IR for both old and new versions to aid debugging.

This is used as an additional debug check when reverting changes to SandboxIR, to verify the reverted state matches the initial state.

Definition at line 77 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/tracker-h">Tracker.h</a>.

### save() {#afbdbbe525f7334a45e65d6c6cdf0a908}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void IRSnapshotChecker::save ()">
Saves a snapshot of the current state.

If there was any previous snapshot, it will be replaced with the new one.
